oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Locust birds not to be molested; etc. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-31. 8763-8765, 8763 rev. and 8764 rev.). |han=kass'o's grandfather ordered him not to throw stones at the locust birds, for if he did the locusts (and the locust birds) would disappear.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Locust birds
